text: Qian shi [likai mai jia sui mu sheng yiqi qianyi dao mai di na de musilin] he fu shi [mai di na de musilin] zhong shouxian xinfeng yisilan jiao zhe, yiji [zai xinyang shang] jinmi zhuisui tamen de ren, an la xihuan tamen, tamen jing'ai an la. Ta wei tamen zhunbeile zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi weida de chenggong.
